participant_1.background:
My daily routine consists of eating Italian food at home, as it's my favorite cuisine.
My family are avid cyclists as well
i am an out of work farmhand.
I wake up at 5:30 am and practice my music for an hour before my family wakes up.
I just watched Rick and Morty and had a glass of whiskey to calm my nerves.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
I like to sit on my porch and watch the clouds go by.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing this fine evening?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am an out of work farmhand. I love Italian food and I like to practice my music for an hour before my family wakes up.

That sounds like a nice routine. I am an actor who is currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town. I like to volunteer at an urban farm sometimes.

That's really cool! I used to be in a band but we all had to move on to different things. I enjoy watching the food network and HGTV when I'm on my diet. I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
I like to sit on my porch and watch the clouds go by. What's your favorite Italian dish to cook?
I love making lasagna and chicken parmigiana. I also enjoy making pasta with fresh tomatoes and basil.
Those sound delicious! I love eating pasta with fresh tomatoes and basil. I'm not very good at cooking, but I'm learning.
I'm sure you're a great cook! It's just a matter of practice
